name: Waifu On Wheels
description:
The Pit Stop crew presents:

Waifu on Wheels

In Waifu on Wheels, cars have become sentient in a world humans have left behind.... in a mess. And you are fed up with it. As you journey to collect parts in order to leave this stinking piece of rock, you meet a rag tag crew that hopes to save it. While you go around talking, interacting, and mingling with these cars, they hope to change your mind, and maybe your heart.

Pit Stop crew members:

Xavier Chua - Artist and Programmer

Kyle Jones - Programming and Design

Diana Melgarejo - Art

Ariana Mertz - Story and Voice Director

Muhammad H. Albayati - Production and Programming

Spcecial thanks to Robert Templeton for voicing Mustang.
